titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Anonymous Ann Arbor letter

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.scopecontent: Letter (with transcript) with illustrated University of Michigan letterhead in which writer, perhaps a student from the East, describes surroundings, the style of dress, etc.
